full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
### Title
Electrical Maintenance and Repairs (W6895-220082)

### Overview
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is issuing a Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) for Electrical Maintenance and Repairs (W6895-220082) at 4 Wing RP Ops detachment Cold Lake, Alberta.

### Procurement Details

* **Procurement Method**: Competitive, Open Bidding
* **Notice Type**: Request for Standing Offer
* **Procurement Category**: CNST
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: None
* **Regions of Delivery**: Cold Lake, AB

### Tender Description
Electrical maintenance and minor new construction services are required on an as-and-when-required basis in various buildings at 4 Wing RP Ops detachment Cold Lake, Alberta. Work must be performed professionally by qualified personnel in their field and in accordance with the latest version of the Canadian Electrical Code. The requirement is subject to the provisions of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

### Key Requirements

* The Standing Offer will be issued for a term of 2 years.
* It is anticipated that three (3) standing offers will be issued to the three (3) lowest compliant bidders.
* The bidder is required to commit to extending the offer for 2 additional 1-year periods.

### Security Requirements
There are security requirements associated with this requirement that must be met.

### Contracting Entity Information
The contracting entity for this requirement is the Department of National Defence (DND).

### Tender Submission Requirements

* All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by November 21, 2022 at 14:00 MST.
* All bids submitted after 14:00 MST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.

### Contact Information
For more information, please contact:
Ben Wong | Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
ben.wong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca | 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage | Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5

### Notice and Solicitation Documentation
